name: Pirate Corp
description:
Pirate Corp is the real time strategy, tower defense, base building game recommended for the modern pirate.

Become Pirate Corps newest and saltiest employee. Take command of the powerful cannon ship launcher to deploy your ships.  Upgrade your ship and base to survive. You might be a natural pirate captain... But then again you're probably just going to end up at the bottom of the ocean.

  • Play the campaign missions or survival mode.
  • Upgrade your ships and buildings.
  • Capture new employees.
  • Unlock new equipment as you progress.
  • Experience a whole new way of launching ships.

If people like this game I will continue to add more content.
